techmeme.title: The USPS halts all inbound parcels from China and Hong Kong, after President Trump ended the "de minimis" exemption, sending the e-commerce industry into chaos (Zeyi Yang/Wired)
Sources: BlackRock plans to hire ~1,200 people to build its AI teams in India and will inherit ~1,500 staff in Bengaluru through its proposed Preqin acquisition (Preeti Singh/Bloomberg)
Lina Khan says that DeepSeek's breakthroughs highlight how US Big Tech's monopolistic practices may actually be hampering the US' technological leadership (Lina M. Khan/New York Times)
Sources: OpenAI has spent months talking about potential commercial deals for Sora with film studios, who are worried about how their data may be used and more (Bloomberg)
Former Google engineer Linwei Ding faces new charges of economic espionage by the US DOJ for allegedly stealing trade secrets to boost China's AI industry (Malathi Nayak/Bloomberg)
